derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French typographie or modern Latin typographia (see type, -graphy)

entry.tran: 印刷版面式样;排版式样；印刷格式
entry.def: Typography is the way in which written material is arranged and prepared for printing.

means.word_mean: 1. the craft of composing type and printing from it
2. art and technique of printing with movable type

stems_affixes.word_buile: typ模式,形状+ical……的→成模式的→典型的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 代表性地, 作为特色地

proto原始+type类型→n.原型;典型,范例
type打字+writer写的人或东西→n.打字机
stero固体的+type型式→固定形式,老套→对……产生成见
